column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque is great BBQ served multiple ways. But the one thing in common is the taste. I heard long ago the sauce actually used the fountain syrup from Coca-Cola. Whatever it is
column2: the taste is pretty unique. Meat is always tender and cooked great. Sides are traditional like coleslaw and Mac and cheese and cornbread but each is delicious--not afterthoughts. Only downside: it's a small
